question:
Consider the following:
  1. Accelerated Irrigation Benefit Programme
  2. Per Drop More Crop
  3. Har Khet ko Pani
  4. Watershed Development
Which of the above are associated with Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojna (PMKSY)?
explanation:
Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojna (PMKSY) has four components:
Accelerated Irrigation Benefit Programme (AIBP) to focus on faster completion of ongoing major and medium Irrigation including National Projects
Har Khet Ko Pani - for creation of new water sources through Minor Irrigation
Per Drop More Crop - Promoting efficient water conveyance and precision water application devices like drips & sprinklers
Watershed Development - For effective management of runoff water and improved soil & moisture conservation activities
